name: UrologySurgery
title: Urology Surgery
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent urological surgeries.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Inclusion Criteria.Includes only relevant concepts associated with urological surgery.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

Backbench standard preparation of living donor renal allograft (open or laparoscopic) prior to transplantation, including dissection and removal of perinephric fat and preparation of ureter(s), renal vein(s), and renal artery(s), ligating branches, as necessary
